functions.description: Complete the chat using a model
functions.name: CHAT_COMPLETE

parameters.name: messages
parameters.description: Either a single message (which will be used as the content of a user message and prefixed with a default system message) or a range of cells containing messages (the first column will be used as the role, the second column as the message and subsequent columns will be ignored).

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The parameters for the model call. The first column is used as parameter keys and the second as values. Subsequent columns are ignored. If a key is repeated in later rows, the value given in the later row replaces the value given in the earlier row.

functions.description: Calculate the cost of the completions in the given cells
functions.name: COST

parameters.name: completions
parameters.description: A cell or range of cells containing chat completions.

parameters.name: prices
parameters.description: The prices per 1K tokens for each model. The first column is the canonical model name, the second is the input token price, and the third is the output token price.
